game.name: Ultra Street Fighter® IV
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play on TV, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 최고의 대전 격투 게임이 새로운 수준의 Ultra Street Fighter IV으로 탄생했습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The world’s greatest fighting game evolves to a whole new level with Ultra Street Fighter IV.

reviewHighlights.text: Probably the only game where I've spend an enormous numbers of hours, without looking back fondly on the experience. The game is fun if you just casua...
Every Hadoken you throw brings you one step closer to becoming a true master.
